posts.topic: Death Penalty: Debates around capital punishment and wrongful convictions

posts.text: Capital punishment is an irreversible state action that often leads to the execution of innocent people. Libertarians demand a justice system that values life and liberty above all else, ending the death penalty is the only ethical choice.
